author: beforeitsnews.com
title: Israel Will Provide Russia With Intelligence on Syrian Opposition | Opinion - Conservative
text:
(Before It's News)
Via Billy
How bad is the Obama foreign policy?
American ally Israel will provide Russia with intelligence for their operations in Syria.
This is what happens when you have an administration that continually shoves Israel aside.
The Middle East Monitor reported:
Israel will provide Russia with intelligence information about opposition sites in Syria to facilitate Moscowâ€™s military operations, Channel 2TV has reported. The Israeli network said that a senior delegation of Russian army officials will arrive in Israel on Tuesday to coordinate the military cooperation.
More @ The Gateway Pundit
